name: Ranulf
description: A cat warrior from Gallia, the home of the beast tribe of laguz. Though young, his king trusts him deeply. Considered the right hand of the future king. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

dialogue.text: I am Ranulf, a warrior of Gallia. That doesn't matter to you, though, does it? Let's just take it nice and easy.
What a sweet little vacation...this isn't going to be. We'll just have to see what happens, I suppose.
There's a beorc in my world who's a little bit...different. Nice guy. Wonder if there's anybody like that here.
Forgive me for saying this, but... Beorc sure do fret over the strangest things. Why can't they learn to relax?
Is the color of my eyes really so strange? Don't stare too long. I'll melt away...
Oh, I'm doing my part. I'm patrolling... That's it—patrolling. Gotta put these ears and nose to work, don't I?
My name is Ranulf. I'm here on behalf of <Friend Name>. Let's take a little break, hmm?
My senses feel...sharper! That's the word, right? Sharper.
Oh, yeah...feeling good. Now you're going to see the fruits of my training!
Uh-oh. Little bit sloppy. Gotta get myself riled up!
Well, then. Will this bring forth something bad, or something good? Let's see...

You are one focused individual, aren't you? Are you on a mission of self-improvement or something? You look a little tired, if you ask me. There's a lot of tension stored in your shoulders. Try to relax... Look, I know how it is. All the people here expect the world from you, and you push yourself way too hard. This is a beorc thing, I guess. But no matter how strong you are, if you exhaust yourself, that's it. You can rely on me sometimes, you know. Just forget about today's battle and let me handle it. That would be irresponsible? No, you're completely turned around. If you drop, what happens then? Well, I've said my piece for today. Just give your pal Ranulf a call when you need him, OK?
